results.name: Triangle, read by rows, where T(n,k) equals the sum of (n-k) terms in row n of triangle A131338 starting at position nk - k(k-1)/2, with the main diagonal formed from the row sums.
example: The rows are derived from triangle A131338 by summing terms in the following manner:
where row n of triangle A131338 consists of n '1's followed by the partial sums of the prior row.
xref: Cf. A131338, A098568, A098569 (row sums), A183203 (antidiagonal sums).
results.author: _Paul D. Hanna_, Dec 30 2010
